Package market.assets

Class AssetBackedByCurrency

java.lang.Object
market.assets.Asset
market.assets.AssetBackedByCurrency
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Searchable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Commodity, InvestmentFundUnit, Share
public abstract class AssetBackedByCurrency extends Asset
In general if something is Backed by some particular currency. We can buy it only for that currency. So Calculating ratio works a little bit differently. Since we at first need to exchange to backing currency and then to main asset
